channel.title: Rladies on Live Free or Dichotomize
channel.description: Recent content in Rladies on Live Free or Dichotomize

item.title: The making of "We R-Ladies"
item.description: Last March Maëlle wrote a blog post “Faces of #rstats Twitter”, a great tutorial on scraping twitter photos and compiling them in a collage. This inspired a similar adventure, but for #RLadies! One of our early brainstorm ideas, as Maëlle pointed out, looks a bit more like a kniting pattern. We brainstormed different ways we could make this collage unique, but ultimilately landed on creating a mosaic with the R-Ladies logo.
